youtube_only: Only YouTube links are accepted for playback.
not_in_voice: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command.
yt_added_queue: The YouTube video **"{title}"** has been added to the queue.
yt_play_error_only_youtube: Only YouTube links are accepted for playback.
yt_error_not_in_voice: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command.
yt_error_conflit: Voice connection conflict. The bot might be used by another feature.
yt_error_connect_fail: Could not connect to voice channel: {error}
yt_error_not_playing: The bot is not currently playing any music.
yt_error_no_voice: I am not connected to a voice channel.
yt_loop_enabled: Loop enabled for the current video.
yt_search_no_results: No results found for this search.
yt_search_choice_slash_desc: Use the dropdown menu above to select a video.
yt_queue_add_desc: **{title}** has been added to the queue.
yt_error_not_connected: I am not connected to a voice channel.
yt_error_choice_invalid: Invalid choice. Please choose a number between 1 and {max}.
sb_list_empty: No sounds found in the folder.
vocal_kick_desc: **{user}** has been kicked from the voice channel.
vocal_kick_all_desc: All users have been kicked from voice.
vkick_success: User kicked from the voice channel.
vkick_error_not_in_voice: User is not in a voice channel.
vkick_error_perm: I don't have permission to kick this user.
vocal_kick_admin_error: You must be an administrator to use this command.
lvl_reset_success_desc: All levels have been successfully reset.
lvl_reset_confirm_desc: You must type 'yes' to confirm the reset.
mods_clear_perm_error: I don't have the necessary permissions to delete messages.
mods_kick_hierarchy_error: You cannot kick this member as they have a higher or equal role.
mods_dm_kick_desc: You have been kicked from the server **{server}**.
mods_kick_perm_error: I don't have the necessary permissions to kick this member.
mods_no_permission: You do not have permission to perform this action.
mods_warn_max_count_error: You cannot add more than 10 warns at once.
mods_dm_warn_desc: You have received a warning on the server **{server}**.
mods_ban_id_desc: The user with ID **{id}** has been banned by {moderator}.
mods_ban_perm_error: I don't have the necessary permissions to ban this user.
mods_unban_desc: The user with ID **{id}** has been unbanned by {moderator}.
mods_bw_added: The word **{word}** has been added to the blacklist.
mods_bw_already_banned: The word **{word}** is already in the blacklist.
mods_bw_removed: The word **{word}** has been removed from the blacklist.
mods_bw_not_found: The word **{word}** is not in the blacklist.
mods_bw_list_empty: The banned words list is empty.
mods_spam_max_error: The maximum count is limited to **{max}**.
mods_spam_min_error: The minimum count must be at least 1.
mods_raid_clean_time_success: All channels created after **{time}** have been deleted.
mods_no_mp_error: This command cannot be used in private messages.
mods_giverole_desc: The role has been given to {user}.
mods_removerole_desc: The role has been removed from {user}.
mods_role_perm_error: I don't have the necessary permissions to manage this role.
mods_auto_ban_desc: **{member}** has been automatically banned for reaching 20 warns.
mods_auto_kick_desc: **{member}** has been automatically kicked for reaching 15 warns.
mods_auto_timeout_desc: **{member}** has been timed out for **{duration}** minutes ({count} warnings).
help_report_desc: Reports a bug or makes a suggestion.
help_mods_desc: Commands to manage members and the server.
help_clear_messages_desc: Deletes a specified number of messages.
help_cleanraidmultiple_desc: Deletes channels created after a specific time.
help_kick_desc: Kicks a member from the server.
help_ban_desc: Bans a member from the server.
help_unban_desc: Unbans a member via their ID.
help_giverole_desc: Gives a role to a user (Owner only).
help_removerole_desc: Removes a role from a user (Owner only).
help_mp_desc: Sends an anonymous message in DM.
help_spam_desc: Sends multiple messages in a channel.
help_banword_desc: Adds a word to the blacklist.
help_unbanword_desc: Removes a word from the blacklist.
help_server_system_val: The bot manages warns per server.
help_auto_sanctions_val: Timeout at 5/10 warns, Kick at 15, Ban at 20.
help_gpt_desc: Asks a question to GPT AI.
help_dalle_desc: Generates an image with DALL-E AI.
help_repeat_desc: Makes the bot repeat a message.
help_8ball_desc: Asks a question to the magic ball.
help_hilaire_desc: Shows a random citation from Hilaire.
help_deldms_desc: Deletes messages sent by the bot in DM.
help_auto_conv_val: Automatically responds to IG/X/Reddit links to show preview.
help_leave_desc: Disconnects the bot from the voice channel.
help_play_desc: Plays a YouTube video via URL.
help_search_desc: Searches and plays a video by keywords.
help_stopm_desc: Stops the music and clears the queue.
help_queue_info_val: The queue supports up to 50 videos.
help_soundboard_desc: Plays short sounds in the voice channel.
help_slist_desc: Shows the list of available sounds.
help_srandom_desc: Plays a random sound every X seconds.
help_srandomskip_desc: Skips to the next random sound.
help_vkick_desc: Kicks a user from the voice channel.
help_tts_desc: Makes the bot speak in voice (Text-to-Speech).
help_conflicts_val: Only one voice playback at a time per server.
help_leveling_desc: Manage experience and levels of members.
help_level_desc: Shows your current level or that of a member.
help_levelsettings_desc: Enables or disables the leveling system.
help_levelboard_desc: Shows the ranking of most active members.
help_auto_system_val: Gain XP by sending messages (1 XP per message).
help_mp_desc_field: Interact with the bot via private message.
help_no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
version_history_tip: Type `/version history:true` to see full history.
version_history_limit: Showing the last 10 versions out of {total}.
report_success: Your report has been sent to the developer!
report_fix_soon: A fix will be applied as soon as possible.
gpt_error_running: A question is already being processed.
gpt_system_prompt: You are a helpful and friendly assistant on Discord.
say_perm_error: You do not have permission to make the bot speak.
say_bot_perm_error: I do not have permission to send messages in {channel}.
say_success_desc: The message has been sent in {channel}.
deldms_done: Done! My messages have been deleted.
deldms_total_none: No messages to delete were found.
error_handler_not_loaded: Error handler is not ready yet.
owner_stop_desc: The bot is shutting down. Final latency: **{latency}ms**
owner_sync_success_desc: Commands have been synced on **{guild}** and globally.
owner_clearslash_loading: Deleting all slash commands from Discord...
owner_clearslash_success_desc: All slash commands have been successfully deleted.
owner_clearslash_warning_value: It may take up to an hour for changes to be visible on Discord.
err_unknown_command_desc: This command does not exist. Use `/helps` to see the list.
err_missing_perms_user_desc: You must have the following permissions: `{perms}`
err_bad_arg_desc: The argument provided for `{command}` is not valid.
err_cooldown_desc: Please wait **{time}s** before using this command again.
err_not_owner_desc: This command is reserved for the bot developer.
err_not_found_desc: The requested resource no longer exists or is inaccessible.
err_invoke_desc: An internal error occurred during command execution.
err_http_desc: A communication error with Discord occurred: {error}
err_check_failure_desc: You do not meet the requirements to use this command.
err_no_private_desc: This command cannot be used in private messages.
err_forbidden_desc: I do not have permission to perform this action.
audio_not_connected: Not connected to a voice channel.
run_missing_deps_list: The following software is not found in PATH:
run_missing_deps_hint: The bot usually requires these to function correctly.
run_manual_config_hint: However, if you have configured paths manually in main.py, you can ignore this.
hilaire_res_1: Work is health, doing nothing preserves it.
hilaire_res_2: He who steals an egg should steal an ox, it's more profitable.
hilaire_res_3: Do not put off until tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
hilaire_res_4: Intelligence is like parachutes, when you don't have it, you crash.
hilaire_res_5: Better to be rich and healthy than poor and sick.
hilaire_res_6: Dictatorship is 'Shut up!', democracy is 'Keep talking!'
hilaire_res_7: It is better to mobilize your intelligence for nonsense than your nonsense for intelligent things.
hilaire_res_8: If you don't like the sea, if you don't like the mountains, if you don't like the city... go to hell!
hilaire_res_9: A pessimist is an optimist with experience.
hilaire_res_10: God said: 'You shall love your neighbor as yourself'. First, I am not my neighbor, and second, I don't like myself that much.
hilaire_res_11: Life is a sexually transmitted terminal illness.
